trans-unit.source: Application Insights for Windows Phone and Store apps | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Application Insights for Windows Phone and Store apps | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Analyze usage and performance of your Windows device app with Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: Analyze usage and performance of your Windows device app with Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: Application Insights for Windows Phone and Store apps
trans-unit.target: Application Insights for Windows Phone and Store apps

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is in preview.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is in preview.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio Application Insights lets you monitor your published application for:
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio Application Insights lets you monitor your published application for:

trans-unit.source: [**Usage**][windowsUsage]—Learn how many users you have and what they are doing with your app.
trans-unit.target: [**Usage**][windowsUsage]—Learn how many users you have and what they are doing with your app.

trans-unit.source: [**Crashes**][windowsCrash]—Get diagnostic reports of crashes and understand their impact on users.
trans-unit.target: [**Crashes**][windowsCrash]—Get diagnostic reports of crashes and understand their impact on users.

trans-unit.source: For many application types, [Visual Studio can add Application Insights to your app](#ide) almost without you noticing.
trans-unit.target: For many application types, [Visual Studio can add Application Insights to your app](#ide) almost without you noticing.

trans-unit.source: But since you're reading this to get a better understanding of what's going on, we'll take you through the steps manually.
trans-unit.target: But since you're reading this to get a better understanding of what's going on, we'll take you through the steps manually.

trans-unit.source: You'll need:
trans-unit.target: You'll need:

trans-unit.source: A subscription to [Microsoft Azure][azure].
trans-unit.target: A subscription to [Microsoft Azure][azure].

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2013 or later.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2013 or later.

trans-unit.source: 1. Create an Application Insights resource
trans-unit.target: 1. Create an Application Insights resource

trans-unit.source: In the [Azure portal][portal], create a new Application Insights resource.
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure portal][portal], create a new Application Insights resource.

trans-unit.source: Choose New, Developer Services, Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Choose New, Developer Services, Application Insights

trans-unit.source: A [resource][roles] in Azure is an instance of a service.
trans-unit.target: A [resource][roles] in Azure is an instance of a service.

trans-unit.source: This resource is where telemetry from your app will be analyzed and presented to you.
trans-unit.target: This resource is where telemetry from your app will be analyzed and presented to you.

trans-unit.source: Copy the Instrumentation Key
trans-unit.target: Copy the Instrumentation Key

trans-unit.source: The key identifies the resource.
trans-unit.target: The key identifies the resource.

trans-unit.source: You'll need it to configure the SDK to send the data to the resource.
trans-unit.target: You'll need it to configure the SDK to send the data to the resource.

trans-unit.source: Open the Essentials drop-down drawer and select the instrumentation key
trans-unit.target: Open the Essentials drop-down drawer and select the instrumentation key

trans-unit.source: 2. Add the Application Insights SDK to your apps
trans-unit.target: 2. Add the Application Insights SDK to your apps

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, add the appropriate SDK to your project.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, add the appropriate SDK to your project.

trans-unit.source: If it's a Windows Universal app, repeat the steps for both the Windows Phone project and the Windows project.
trans-unit.target: If it's a Windows Universal app, repeat the steps for both the Windows Phone project and the Windows project.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the project in Solution Explorer and choose **Manage NuGet Packages**.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the project in Solution Explorer and choose **Manage NuGet Packages**.

trans-unit.source: Search for "Application Insights".
trans-unit.target: Search for "Application Insights".

trans-unit.source: Choose **Application Insights for Windows Applications**
trans-unit.target: Choose **Application Insights for Windows Applications**

trans-unit.source: Add an ApplicationInsights.config file to the root of your project and insert the instrumentation key copied from the portal.
trans-unit.target: Add an ApplicationInsights.config file to the root of your project and insert the instrumentation key copied from the portal.

trans-unit.source: A sample xml for this config file is shown below.
trans-unit.target: A sample xml for this config file is shown below.

trans-unit.source: Set the properties of the ApplicationInsights.config file: **Build Action** == **Content** and **Copy to Output Directory** == **Copy always**.
trans-unit.target: Set the properties of the ApplicationInsights.config file: **Build Action** == **Content** and **Copy to Output Directory** == **Copy always**.

trans-unit.source: Add the following initialization code.
trans-unit.target: Add the following initialization code.

trans-unit.source: It is best to add this code to the `App()` constructor.
trans-unit.target: It is best to add this code to the `App()` constructor.

trans-unit.source: If you do it somewhere else, you might miss auto collection of the first pageviews.
trans-unit.target: If you do it somewhere else, you might miss auto collection of the first pageviews.

trans-unit.source: **Windows Universal apps**: Repeat the steps for both the Phone and the Store project.
trans-unit.target: **Windows Universal apps**: Repeat the steps for both the Phone and the Store project.

trans-unit.source: [Example of a Windows 8.1 Universal app](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-Home/tree/master/Samples/Windows%208.1%20Universal).
trans-unit.target: [Example of a Windows 8.1 Universal app](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-Home/tree/master/Samples/Windows%208.1%20Universal).

trans-unit.source: 3. Enable network access for your app
trans-unit.target: 3. Enable network access for your app

trans-unit.source: If your app doesn't already [request outgoing network access](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh452752.aspx), you'll have to add that to its manifest as a [required capability](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br211477.aspx).
trans-unit.target: If your app doesn't already [request outgoing network access](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh452752.aspx), you'll have to add that to its manifest as a [required capability](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br211477.aspx).

trans-unit.source: 4. Run your project
trans-unit.target: 4. Run your project

trans-unit.source: [Run your application with F5](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/bg161304.aspx) and use it, so as to generate some telemetry.
trans-unit.target: [Run your application with F5](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/bg161304.aspx) and use it, so as to generate some telemetry.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, you'll see a count of the events that have been received.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, you'll see a count of the events that have been received.

trans-unit.source: In debug mode, telemetry is sent as soon as it's generated.
trans-unit.target: In debug mode, telemetry is sent as soon as it's generated.

trans-unit.source: In release mode, telemetry is stored on the device and sent only when the app resumes.
trans-unit.target: In release mode, telemetry is stored on the device and sent only when the app resumes.

trans-unit.source: 5. See monitor data
trans-unit.target: 5. See monitor data

trans-unit.source: Open Application Insights from your project.
trans-unit.target: Open Application Insights from your project.

trans-unit.source: Right-click your project and open the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: Right-click your project and open the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: At first, you'll just see one or two points.
trans-unit.target: At first, you'll just see one or two points.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: Click through to more data
trans-unit.target: Click through to more data

trans-unit.source: Click **Refresh** after a few seconds if you're expecting more data.
trans-unit.target: Click **Refresh** after a few seconds if you're expecting more data.

trans-unit.source: Click any chart to see more detail.
trans-unit.target: Click any chart to see more detail.

trans-unit.source: 5. Publish your application to Store
trans-unit.target: 5. Publish your application to Store

trans-unit.source: [Publish your application](http://dev.windows.com/publish) and watch the data accumulate as users download and use it.
trans-unit.target: [Publish your application](http://dev.windows.com/publish) and watch the data accumulate as users download and use it.

trans-unit.source: Customize your telemetry
trans-unit.target: Customize your telemetry

trans-unit.source: Choose the collectors
trans-unit.target: Choose the collectors

trans-unit.source: Application Insights SDK Includes several collectors, which collect different types of data from your app automatically.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights SDK Includes several collectors, which collect different types of data from your app automatically.

trans-unit.source: By default, they are all active.
trans-unit.target: By default, they are all active.

trans-unit.source: But you can choose which collectors to initialize in the app constructor:
trans-unit.target: But you can choose which collectors to initialize in the app constructor:

trans-unit.source: Send your own telemetry data
trans-unit.target: Send your own telemetry data

trans-unit.source: Use the [API][api] to send events, metrics and diagnostic data to Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: Use the [API][api] to send events, metrics and diagnostic data to Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: In summary:
trans-unit.target: In summary:

trans-unit.source: For more details, see [Custom Events and Metrics][api].
trans-unit.target: For more details, see [Custom Events and Metrics][api].

trans-unit.source: What's next?
trans-unit.target: What's next?

trans-unit.source: [Detect and diagnose crashes in your app][windowsCrash]
trans-unit.target: [Detect and diagnose crashes in your app][windowsCrash]

trans-unit.source: [Learn about metrics][metrics]
trans-unit.target: [Learn about metrics][metrics]

trans-unit.source: [Learn about diagnostic search][diagnostic]
trans-unit.target: [Learn about diagnostic search][diagnostic]

trans-unit.source: Automated setup
trans-unit.target: Automated setup

trans-unit.source: If you prefer to let Visual Studio perform the setup steps, you can do that with Windows Phone, Windows Store, and many other types of apps.
trans-unit.target: If you prefer to let Visual Studio perform the setup steps, you can do that with Windows Phone, Windows Store, and many other types of apps.

trans-unit.source: If you're creating a new Windows app project ...
trans-unit.target: If you're creating a new Windows app project ...

trans-unit.source: Select **Application Insights** in the **New Project** dialog.
trans-unit.target: Select **Application Insights** in the **New Project** dialog.

trans-unit.source: If you're asked to sign in, use the credentials for your Azure account (which is separate from your Visual Studio Online account).
trans-unit.target: If you're asked to sign in, use the credentials for your Azure account (which is separate from your Visual Studio Online account).

trans-unit.source: Or if it's an existing project ...
trans-unit.target: Or if it's an existing project ...

trans-unit.source: Add Application Insights from Solution Explorer.
trans-unit.target: Add Application Insights from Solution Explorer.

trans-unit.source: Upgrade to a new release of the SDK
trans-unit.target: Upgrade to a new release of the SDK

trans-unit.source: When a [new SDK version is released](app-insights-release-notes-windows.md):
trans-unit.target: When a [new SDK version is released](app-insights-release-notes-windows.md):

trans-unit.source: Right-click your project and choose Manage NuGet Packages.
trans-unit.target: Right-click your project and choose Manage NuGet Packages.

trans-unit.source: Select the installed Application Insights packages and choose **Action: Upgrade**.
trans-unit.target: Select the installed Application Insights packages and choose **Action: Upgrade**.

trans-unit.source: Next Steps
trans-unit.target: Next Steps

trans-unit.target: [Detect and diagnose crashes in your app][windowsCrash]

trans-unit.target: [Capture and search diagnostic logs][diagnostic]

trans-unit.target: [Track usage of your app][windowsUsage]

trans-unit.target: [Use the API to send custom telemetry][api]

trans-unit.target: [Troubleshooting][qna]

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
